summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Chez Loman restaurant website after luxury dark theme redesign. All functionality preserved with beautiful new design featuring dark backgrounds (#05100D) and gold accents (#D4AF37). Backend APIs, frontend features, and integrations all working perfectly.

design_issues.issue: Admin page link not visible in main navigation menu
design_issues.impact: Admin page accessible via direct URL but not discoverable through navigation
design_issues.note: Admin functionality works perfectly when accessed directly

passed_tests: All 25 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with luxury dark theme (#05100D background)
Gold accent color (#D4AF37) properly implemented (149 elements)
Typography using Playfair Display and Cormorant Garamond fonts
Navigation works for all pages: Accueil, La Carte, Notre Histoire, Galerie, Contact
Menu page displays dishes with working category filters and gold accents
Gallery page shows 7 photos with hover effects and category filtering
Contact page displays hours, address, WhatsApp buttons, Google Maps iframe
Admin page - Daily Menu creation with date, items, special message works
Admin page - Gallery photo addition with URL, caption, category selection works
WhatsApp integration: 8 links with correct phone number (+225 07 09 508 819)
Phone number integration: 3 tel: links working
Responsive design: 29 responsive elements detected
Animations and transitions: 22 elements with smooth effects
Mobile responsiveness tested and working
All CRUD operations for daily menu and gallery photos functional
Error handling for invalid API requests working (404 responses)
Data seeding functionality working
Restaurant info endpoint returning correct data
WhatsApp floating button positioned and working
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding admin link to main navigation menu for better discoverability (currently only accessible via direct URL /admin)
